title: # 409 - Ben Schwartz & ME
description:
Today I sit down with actor/comedian Ben Schwartz. We talk about shooting his improv Netflix show, doing Letterman, becoming friends with Billy Crystal, Space Force, improv vs standup, and much more! 

Ben’s new special “Middleditch & Schwartz” is streaming on Netflix now.

This episode is brought to you by Whoop. Get 15% off with the code “BERT” at checkout at www.whoop.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Adam & Eve. Go to www.adamandeve.com and

use the offer code BERT to get 50% off just about any item plus 10 FREE Gifts.

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, and sexual wellness for men. Try hims today and get your first month free. Go to www.forhims.com/bertcast 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. Check out this week’s menu and get thirty dollars off across your first two deliveries when you visit www.Blueapron.com/bertcast  

This episode is brought to you by Buffalo Trace whiskey. Go to www.Buffalotrace.com to order yours today.

This episode is brought to you by Fiverr. Take Five and check out www.FIVERR.com and get 10% off your first order by using my code BERTCAST at checkout.

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer
